name: USCLibrariesFAQ
0:
”Alexa, open USC Libraries”
”Alexa, ask USC Libraries Are books available to be borrowed by alumni”
”Alexa, ask USC Libraries how do I renew a book”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: u. s. c. libraries
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is for getting answers of most commonly asked questions by patrons at University of Southern California Libraries.

Skill is in development and if requested, we would enhance it to be able to do more, like answer ready reference and directional questions, library hours, events, room availability, library collections.

This skill is sponsored by USC Libraries.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
